name: fun-with-perl
comments: Break out your JAPHs and one-liners. You might also enjoy http://history.perl.org/oneliners/ and http://linguist.dartmouth.edu/~rjk/perlgolf/holes.html
unsub: Send an empty email to mailto: fwp-unsubscribe@perl.org
summary: If you enjoy Perl puzzles and golf, consider joining the FWP list as it is devoted to Perlmania of all kinds.
sub: Send an empty email to mailto: fwp-subscribe@perl.org
help: send an empty email to mailto: fun-with-perl-help@perl.org
